Feats-Skill-Medicine -- Female Skilled Human Bard: 3

Background: Fortune Teller Deity: Gozreh

Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 6 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Skilled Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Advanced First Aid: Can use Administer First Aid to reduce a frightened or sickened condition by 2, or remove it entirely with a critical success
Battle Medicine: (1) Uses Medicine to restore Hit Points once per target per day
Continual Recovery: Can repeat Treat Wounds on a patient after 10 min
Legendary Medic: Can use a 1 hr process and a successful Medicine check to remove a disease or condition once per target per day
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Robust Recovery: Success on Treat a Disease or a Poison gives a +4 bonus, and patient successes are critical successes
Unusual Treatment: Successful DC 20 check to Treat Wounds reduces one of clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied by 1 once per patient per day
Ward Medic: Can use Medicine to Treat Disease or Treat Wounds on up to 2 creatures simultaneously
Combat
Hit Points: 35 Armor Class: 17 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Bard: 17 (charisma; trained)
Armor: None Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Halberd (+7 1d10+2 P/S; strength; trained); Light Mace (+7 1d4+2 B; strength; trained); Shield Spikes (+7 1d6+2 P; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Longbow as one category simpler
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 2
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation may substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Lingering Composition (O1 Foc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd, or 4 rd on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Soothe (O1): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 Hit Points)
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Lingering Composition: Knows the Lingering Composition occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Maestro: Knows the Soothe occult spell
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Directed Audience: Can redirect the emanation of a composition spell into a cone up to 10' or twice the area
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced First Aid Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and medicine rank (currently 2) >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 2 available vs. 7 allocated
Legendary Medic Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and medicine rank (currently 2) >= 4
